mapper.select:
select * from (select * from (select notice_num,subject,writer,to_char(writedate,'YYYY-MM-DD') writedate from notice
order by notice_num desc) where rownum<=(${nowPage}*${onePageRecord})order by notice_num asc) where rownum<=${lastPageRecordCount} order by notice_num desc
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%' order by notice_num desc) where rownum<=(${nowPage}*${onePageRecord})order by notice_num asc) where rownum<=${lastPageRecordCount} order by notice_num desc
select notice_num, subject, content, writer, to_char(writedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') writedate from notice where notice_num=${param1}

select count(notice_num) from notice
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'

select * from (select * from (select event_num, subject, to_char(startdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') startdate, to_char(enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') enddate, event_img from event where enddate >= sysdate order by enddate asc) where rownum<=(${nowPage}*${onePageRecord}) order by enddate desc) where rownum<=${lastPageRecordCount} order by enddate asc

select * from (select * from (select event_num, subject, to_char(startdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') startdate, to_char(enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') enddate, event_img from event where enddate < sysdate order by enddate desc) where rownum<=(${nowPage}*${onePageRecord}) order by enddate asc) where rownum<=${lastPageRecordCount} order by enddate desc
select event_num, subject, to_char(startdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') startdate, to_char(enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') enddate, to_char(writedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') writedate, content from event where event_num=${param1}
select count(event_num) from event where enddate >= sysdate order by enddate
select count(event_num) from event where enddate <= sysdate order by enddate
mapper.insert: insert into event_reply values(${event_num}, a_sq.nextval, '${userid}', '${content}', sysdate, '${ip}')
mapper.select: select e.userid userid, reply_num, nickname, content, to_char(writedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') writedate, ip from event_reply e join member m on e.userid = m.userid where event_num=${param1} order by reply_num desc
mapper.delete: delete from event_reply where reply_num=${reply_num} and userid='${userid}'
